linha de conando:
cscript configure.js ftp:no http:no html:no catalog:no docb:no xinclude:no iconv:no xml_debug:no schematron:no modules:no valid:no legacy:no static:yes

 
# .\config.msvc
# This file is generated automatically by configure.js.

LIBXML_MAJOR_VERSION=2
LIBXML_MINOR_VERSION=7
LIBXML_MICRO_VERSION=3
LIBXML_MICRO_VERSION_SUFFIX=
XML_SRCDIR=..
UTILS_SRCDIR=..
WITH_TRIO=0
WITH_THREADS=native
WITH_FTP=0
WITH_HTTP=0
WITH_HTML=0
WITH_C14N=1
WITH_CATALOG=0
WITH_DOCB=0
WITH_XPATH=1
WITH_XPTR=1
WITH_XINCLUDE=0
WITH_ICONV=0
WITH_ISO8859X=0
WITH_ZLIB=0
WITH_DEBUG=0
WITH_MEM_DEBUG=0
WITH_RUN_DEBUG=0
WITH_SCHEMAS=1
WITH_SCHEMATRON=0
WITH_REGEXPS=0
WITH_MODULES=0
WITH_TREE=1
WITH_READER=1
WITH_WRITER=1
WITH_WALKER=1
WITH_PATTERN=1
WITH_PUSH=1
WITH_VALID=0
WITH_SAX1=1
WITH_LEGACY=0
WITH_OUTPUT=1
WITH_PYTHON=0
DEBUG=0
STATIC=0
PREFIX=.
BINPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\bin
INCPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\include
LIBPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
SOPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
INCLUDE=$(INCLUDE);.
LIB=$(LIB);.
CRUNTIME=/MD
VCMANIFEST=0
